Class AbstractComponent.AbstractTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent.AbstractTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    AbstractContinuation
    Enclosing class:
    AbstractComponent

    public abstract static class AbstractComponent.AbstractTask
extends java.lang.Object
implements ComponentI.ComponentTask
    The abstract class AbstractTask provides the basic method implementations for component tasks.
